name: Nature's Guardian
description: A bear summoned through the magic of the forest, ready to rend the enemies of nature.  Its eyes are a brilliant green amd moss grows throughout its thick fur.

name: Conjured Undine
description: A swirling mass of animated water in the vague shape of a human form.  A suggestion of hair and eyes and four limbs, but no individual features are distinguishable.  When it moves, it simply flows and then reforms into its previous shape.

special_attacks.hit_dmg_u: %s gestures and a stream of water arcs up and crashes into you!
special_attacks.hit_dmg_npc: %s gestures and a stream of water arcs up and crashes into <npcname>!
special_attacks.miss_msg_u: %s gestures and a stream of water arcs up, but you move before it hits!
special_attacks.miss_msg_npc: %s gestures and a stream of water arcs up, but <npcname> moves out of the way!

special_attacks.monster_message: %1$s gestures and a wall of water surges forth!

death_function.message: The %s falls apart in a rush of water!
